0.PRODUCT_NAME: BERT Base Uncased TensorFlow Sentence Pair Classification
0.ABOUT: This is a Sentence Pair Classification model built upon a Text Embedding model from [TensorFlow Hub](https://tfhub.dev/tensorflow/bert_en_uncased_L-12_H-768_A-12/2 ). It takes a pair of sentences as input and classifies the input pair to 'entailment' or 'no-entailment'. The class label entailment implies the second sentence entails the first sentence, and the no-entailment implies it does not. The Text Embedding model which is pre-trained on WikiPedia and BookCorpus returns an embedding of the .nput pair of sentences.

7.PRODUCT_NAME: Unbound CORE for Crypto Asset Security
7.ABOUT: Unbound’s Crypto Asset Security Platform secures cryptocurrency and other blockchain-based digital assets via secure multi-party computation (SMPC). CASP enables organizations managing tokenized assets to adopt ultra-fast transaction signing and advanced risk-based approval policies which scale as your business grows. Leveraged by the world’s top exchanges and banks, based on FIPS 140-2 L2 validated infrastructure, CASP eliminates the tradeoff between security and usability and takes next level. CASP can be tailored to both exchanges (via a software-only cryptographic key security system) and custodians (via integration with HSM systems and offline validation capabilities).

10.ABOUT:
Are you failing to consistently close sales? Despite what some people might tell you, the problem may not be your salesmanship or your pitch—it could be a problem with your qualification methodology. MEDDIC is the most renowned Sales Qualification Methodology, applicable to any Enterprise Sales Process which is rather complex. The definition of MEDDIC is the acronym it represents, composed of six elements. They represent the MEDDIC checklist as described below: METRICS: Measure theain leading to the economic benefit of your solution vs. competition.
ECONOMIC BUYER : Identify and meet the person who has the ultimate word to release funds to purchase.
DECISION PROCESS: Know and Influence the process defined by the client to make purchase decision.
DECISION CRITERIA: Know and Influence the criteria defined by the client to make purchase decision.
IDENTIFY PAIN: Identify and Analyze the pains which require your solution to be relieved.
CHAMPION : Identify, Qualify, Develop and Test your Champion or your Internal Seller.
In a nutshell, MEDDIC tells you that if you do the above in any complex B-to-B sales campaign, you win the sale.

We offer both ONLINE and IN-PERSON training and workshop.

Both programs include all the courses that you see here:
https://trainings.meddic.academy/
The main training, being the full MEDDIC bundle, lasts 2 hours approx (10 short 10-15 minutes mini courses):
https://trainings.meddic.academy/bundles/full-meddic-course
The bundle is composed of the MEDDIC original courses plus modules which are exclusively available at MEDDIC Academy (such as

14.ABOUT:
Eleven is powerful cloud accounting software tailored for accounting firms. With its pay-per-accountant pricing model, Eleven allows you to account all-you-can without worrying about individual company subscriptions. On top of that, there are no paywalled features or transaction limits. The app covers all core accounting tasks like AR/AP, General Ledger and Journal entries, statutory reporting, bank feeds and reconciliations, document management, reporting and BI and has a powerfuegrate with other apps and point of sales software.

Top features:

#1. Multi-company interface
You can handle an unlimited number of clients in one app without having to log in or log out which also brings transparency for managing partners or directors.

#2. Enterprise-level General Ledger
Designed to scale as you grow, Eleven General Ledger can handle thousands of transactions in a snap. 

#3. Multi-currency accounting
You can choose currencies at the line level in every journal entry. There is extended support for Monetary accounts with reporting on the PnL or Balance Sheet. An FX rate can be entered manually or you can use Eleven to get rates automatically. Eleven will also automatically generate the currency revaluations

#4. Custom reports and BI
You can generate customized reports or dashboards, combining 21 widgets with all the data updated in real-time. 

#5. White-glove onboarding and support
A dedicated support team in Singapore will help you at every stage. There is also extensive support documentation and a smart migration tool available.
